name.en: Melel the Beautiful Flame Spirit of the Lamp
name.ja: ランプの<ruby>炎<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>麗<rt>れい</rt></ruby>メルエル

effect.en: Draw 1 card and show it. Then, if that card is a Pyro Type monster, you can Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower Pyro Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field.

materials.en: "Methyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp" + "Ethyl the Flame Jinn of the Lamp"

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
